chart_metadata.description: MeshCentral is a full computer management web site
chart_metadata.name: meshcentral

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: aliasPort
attrs.description: The actual main port as seen externally on the Internet, this setting is often used when a reverse-proxy is used.

attrs.label: cert
attrs.description: Set this to the primary DNS name of this MeshCentral server.

attrs.label: tlsOffload
attrs.description: When true, indicates that a TLS offloader is in front of the MeshCentral server. More typically, set this to the IP address of the reverse proxy or TLS offloader so that IP forwarding headers will be trusted. For example 172.16.0.0/16

attrs.label: trustedProxy
attrs.description: Trust forwarded headers from these IPs or domains. Providing the magic string "CloudFlare" will cause the server to download the IP address list of trusted CloudFlare proxies directly from CloudFlare on each server start. For example 172.16.0.0/16. This should be left empty if traefik is used.

attrs.label: WANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral WAN features are enabled and agents will connect to the server using a well known DNS name.

attrs.label: LANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral LAN features are enabled and agents will find the server using multicast LAN packets.

attrs.label: webRTC
attrs.description: When enabled, allows use of WebRTC to allow direct network traffic between the agent and browser.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Enables GZIP compression for web requests.

attrs.label: wsCompression
attrs.description: Enables server-side, websocket per-message deflate compression.

attrs.label: agentWsCompression
attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.label: agentLogDump
attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.label: agentCoreDump
attrs.description: Automatically activates and transfers any agent crash dump files to the server in meshcentral-data/coredumps.

attrs.label: browserPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval and expects a response from the browser.

attrs.label: browserPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.label: agentPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentIdleTimeout
attrs.description: How much time in seconds with no traffic from an agent before dropping the agent connection.

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid login attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid login attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that login attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid login limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV
attrs.description: Enabled automated upload of the server backups to a WebDAV account.

attrs.label: url
attrs.description: WebDAV account URL.

attrs.label: username
attrs.description: WebDAV account username.

attrs.label: password
attrs.description: WebDAV account password.

attrs.label: folderName
attrs.description: The name of the folder to create in the WebDAV account.

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS
attrs.description: When set, relayPort value is ignored. Set this to a DNS name the points to this server. When the server is accessed using the DNS name, the main web server port is used as a web relay port.

attrs.label: Setup Messaging
attrs.description: This section allow MeshCentral to send messages over user messaging networks like Discord

subquestions.label: telegram
subquestions.description: Configure Telegram messaging system

subquestions.label: discord
subquestions.description: Configure Discord messaging system

subquestions.label: xmpp
subquestions.description: Configure XMPP messaging system

attrs.label: certUrl
attrs.description: HTTPS URL when to get the TLS certificate that MeshAgent's will see when connecting to this server. This setting is used when a reverse proxy like Traefik is used in front of MeshCentral.

attrs.label: title
attrs.description: The title of this web site. All web pages will have this title.

attrs.label: title2
attrs.description: Secondary title text that is placed on the upper right on the title on many web pages.

attrs.label: welcomeText
attrs.description: Text that will be shown on the login screen.

attrs.label: minify
attrs.description: When enabled, the server will send reduced sized web pages.

attrs.label: localSessionRecording
attrs.description: When false, removes the local recording feature on remote desktop.

attrs.label: mstsc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based RDP client.

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based SSH client.

attrs.label: novnc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based VNC client.

attrs.label: geoLocation
attrs.description: Enables the geo-location feature and device location map in the user interface, this feature is not being worked on.

attrs.label: nightMode
attrs.description: 0 = User selects day/night mode, 1 = Always night mode, 2 = Always day mode

attrs.label: siteStyle
attrs.description: Valid numbers are 1 and 2, changes the style of the login page and some secondary pages.

attrs.label: rdp
attrs.description: Display a RDP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: Display a SSH link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: scp
attrs.description: Display a SCP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: Setup Agent Customization
attrs.description: Use this section to customize the agent branding.

attrs.label: displayName
attrs.description: The name of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: description
attrs.description: The description of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: companyName
attrs.description: This will be used as the path to install the agent, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's.

attrs.label: serviceName
attrs.description: The name of the background service, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's but should be set to an all lower case, no space string.

attrs.label: installText
attrs.description: Text string to show in the agent installation dialog box.

attrs.label: image
attrs.description: The filename of a image file in .png format located in meshcentral-data to display in the MeshCentral Agent installation dialog, image should be square and from 64x64 to 200x200.

attrs.label: fileName
attrs.description: The agent filename.

attrs.label: foregroundColor
attrs.description: Foreground text color, valid values are RBG in format 0,0,0 to 255,255,255 or format "#000000" to "#FFFFFF".

attrs.label: backgroundColor
attrs.description: Background color, valid values are RBG in format 0,0,0 to 255,255,255 or format "#000000" to "#FFFFFF".

attrs.label: Main Service
attrs.description: The Primary service on which the healthcheck runs, often the webUI

attrs.description: ClusterIP's are only internally available and Loadbalancer exposes the service using the system loadbalancer

15.1.1.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
15.1.1.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.description: When true, indicates that a TLS offloader is in front of the MeshCentral server. More typically, set this to the IP address of the reverse proxy or TLS offloader so that IP forwarding headers will be trusted. For example 172.16.0.0/16

attrs.label: trustedProxy
attrs.description: Trust forwarded headers from these IPs or domains. Providing the magic string "CloudFlare" will cause the server to download the IP address list of trusted CloudFlare proxies directly from CloudFlare on each server start. For example 172.16.0.0/16. This should be left empty if traefik is used.

attrs.label: WANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral WAN features are enabled and agents will connect to the server using a well known DNS name.

attrs.label: LANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral LAN features are enabled and agents will find the server using multicast LAN packets.

attrs.label: webRTC
attrs.description: When enabled, allows use of WebRTC to allow direct network traffic between the agent and browser.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Enables GZIP compression for web requests.

attrs.label: wsCompression
attrs.description: Enables server-side, websocket per-message deflate compression.

attrs.label: agentWsCompression
attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.label: agentLogDump
attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.label: agentCoreDump
attrs.description: Automatically activates and transfers any agent crash dump files to the server in meshcentral-data/coredumps.

attrs.label: browserPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval and expects a response from the browser.

attrs.label: browserPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.label: agentPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentIdleTimeout
attrs.description: How much time in seconds with no traffic from an agent before dropping the agent connection.

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid login attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid login attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that login attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid login limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV
attrs.description: Enabled automated upload of the server backups to a WebDAV account.

attrs.label: url
attrs.description: WebDAV account URL.

attrs.label: username
attrs.description: WebDAV account username.

attrs.label: password
attrs.description: WebDAV account password.

attrs.label: folderName
attrs.description: The name of the folder to create in the WebDAV account.

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS
attrs.description: When set, relayPort value is ignored. Set this to a DNS name the points to this server. When the server is accessed using the DNS name, the main web server port is used as a web relay port.

attrs.label: Setup Messaging
attrs.description: This section allow MeshCentral to send messages over user messaging networks like Discord

subquestions.label: telegram
subquestions.description: Configure Telegram messaging system

subquestions.label: discord
subquestions.description: Configure Discord messaging system

subquestions.label: xmpp
subquestions.description: Configure XMPP messaging system

attrs.label: certUrl
attrs.description: HTTPS URL when to get the TLS certificate that MeshAgent's will see when connecting to this server. This setting is used when a reverse proxy like Traefik is used in front of MeshCentral.

attrs.label: title
attrs.description: The title of this web site. All web pages will have this title.

attrs.label: title2
attrs.description: Secondary title text that is placed on the upper right on the title on many web pages.

attrs.label: welcomeText
attrs.description: Text that will be shown on the login screen.

attrs.label: minify
attrs.description: When enabled, the server will send reduced sized web pages.

attrs.label: localSessionRecording
attrs.description: When false, removes the local recording feature on remote desktop.

attrs.label: mstsc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based RDP client.

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based SSH client.

attrs.label: novnc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based VNC client.

attrs.label: geoLocation
attrs.description: Enables the geo-location feature and device location map in the user interface, this feature is not being worked on.

attrs.label: nightMode
attrs.description: 0 = User selects day/night mode, 1 = Always night mode, 2 = Always day mode

attrs.label: siteStyle
attrs.description: Valid numbers are 1 and 2, changes the style of the login page and some secondary pages.

attrs.label: rdp
attrs.description: Display a RDP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: Display a SSH link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: scp
attrs.description: Display a SCP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: Setup Agent Customization
attrs.description: Use this section to customize the agent branding.

attrs.label: displayName
attrs.description: The name of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: description
attrs.description: The description of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: companyName
attrs.description: This will be used as the path to install the agent, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's.

attrs.label: serviceName
attrs.description: The name of the background service, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's but should be set to an all lower case, no space string.

attrs.label: installText
attrs.description: Text string to show in the agent installation dialog box.

attrs.label: image
attrs.description: The filename of a image file in .png format located in meshcentral-data to display in the MeshCentral Agent installation dialog, image should be square and from 64x64 to 200x200.

attrs.label: fileName
attrs.description: The agent filename.

attrs.label: foregroundColor
attrs.description: Foreground text color, valid values are RBG in format 0,0,0 to 255,255,255 or format "#000000" to "#FFFFFF".

attrs.label: backgroundColor
attrs.description: Background color, valid values are RBG in format 0,0,0 to 255,255,255 or format "#000000" to "#FFFFFF".

15.1.0.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
15.1.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.label: agentLogDump
attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.label: agentCoreDump
attrs.description: Automatically activates and transfers any agent crash dump files to the server in meshcentral-data/coredumps.

attrs.label: browserPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval and expects a response from the browser.

attrs.label: browserPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.label: agentPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentIdleTimeout
attrs.description: How much time in seconds with no traffic from an agent before dropping the agent connection.

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid login attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid login attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that login attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid login limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV
attrs.description: Enabled automated upload of the server backups to a WebDAV account.

attrs.label: url
attrs.description: WebDAV account URL.

attrs.label: username
attrs.description: WebDAV account username.

attrs.label: password
attrs.description: WebDAV account password.

attrs.label: folderName
attrs.description: The name of the folder to create in the WebDAV account.

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS
attrs.description: When set, relayPort value is ignored. Set this to a DNS name the points to this server. When the server is accessed using the DNS name, the main web server port is used as a web relay port.

attrs.label: Setup Messaging
attrs.description: This section allow MeshCentral to send messages over user messaging networks like Discord

subquestions.label: telegram
subquestions.description: Configure Telegram messaging system

subquestions.label: discord
subquestions.description: Configure Discord messaging system

subquestions.label: xmpp
subquestions.description: Configure XMPP messaging system

attrs.label: certUrl
attrs.description: HTTPS URL when to get the TLS certificate that MeshAgent's will see when connecting to this server. This setting is used when a reverse proxy like Traefik is used in front of MeshCentral.

attrs.label: title
attrs.description: The title of this web site. All web pages will have this title.

attrs.label: title2
attrs.description: Secondary title text that is placed on the upper right on the title on many web pages.

attrs.label: welcomeText
attrs.description: Text that will be shown on the login screen.

attrs.label: minify
attrs.description: When enabled, the server will send reduced sized web pages.

attrs.label: localSessionRecording
attrs.description: When false, removes the local recording feature on remote desktop.

attrs.label: mstsc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based RDP client.

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based SSH client.

attrs.label: novnc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based VNC client.

attrs.label: geoLocation
attrs.description: Enables the geo-location feature and device location map in the user interface, this feature is not being worked on.

attrs.label: nightMode
attrs.description: 0 = User selects day/night mode, 1 = Always night mode, 2 = Always day mode

attrs.label: siteStyle
attrs.description: Valid numbers are 1 and 2, changes the style of the login page and some secondary pages.

attrs.label: rdp
attrs.description: Display a RDP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: Display a SSH link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: scp
attrs.description: Display a SCP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: Setup Agent Customization
attrs.description: Use this section to customize the agent branding.

attrs.label: displayName
attrs.description: The name of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: description
attrs.description: The description of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.label: companyName
attrs.description: This will be used as the path to install the agent, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's.

attrs.label: serviceName
attrs.description: The name of the background service, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's but should be set to an all lower case, no space string.

attrs.label: installText

attrs.label: image
attrs.description: The filename of a image file in .png format located in meshcentral-data to display in the MeshCentral Agent installation dialog, image should be square and from 64x64 to 200x200.

attrs.label: fileName
attrs.description: The agent filename.

attrs.label: foregroundColor

15.0.0.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
15.0.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: aliasPort
attrs.description: The actual main port as seen externally on the Internet, this setting is often used when a reverse-proxy is used.

attrs.label: cert
attrs.description: Set this to the primary DNS name of this MeshCentral server.

attrs.label: tlsOffload
attrs.description: When true, indicates that a TLS offloader is in front of the MeshCentral server. More typically, set this to the IP address of the reverse proxy or TLS offloader so that IP forwarding headers will be trusted. For example 172.16.0.0/16

attrs.label: trustedProxy
attrs.description: Trust forwarded headers from these IPs or domains. Providing the magic string "CloudFlare" will cause the server to download the IP address list of trusted CloudFlare proxies directly from CloudFlare on each server start. For example 172.16.0.0/16. This should be left empty if traefik is used.

attrs.label: WANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral WAN features are enabled and agents will connect to the server using a well known DNS name.

attrs.label: LANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral LAN features are enabled and agents will find the server using multicast LAN packets.

attrs.label: webRTC
attrs.description: When enabled, allows use of WebRTC to allow direct network traffic between the agent and browser.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Enables GZIP compression for web requests.

attrs.label: wsCompression
attrs.description: Enables server-side, websocket per-message deflate compression.

attrs.label: agentWsCompression
attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.label: agentPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentIdleTimeout
attrs.description: How much time in seconds with no traffic from an agent before dropping the agent connection.

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid login attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid login attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that login attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid login limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS
attrs.description: When set, relayPort value is ignored. Set this to a DNS name the points to this server. When the server is accessed using the DNS name, the main web server port is used as a web relay port.

attrs.label: Setup Messaging
attrs.description: This section allow MeshCentral to send messages over user messaging networks like Discord

subquestions.label: xmpp
subquestions.description: Configure XMPP messaging system

attrs.label: certUrl
attrs.description: HTTPS URL when to get the TLS certificate that MeshAgent's will see when connecting to this server. This setting is used when a reverse proxy like Traefik is used in front of MeshCentral.

attrs.label: title
attrs.description: The title of this web site. All web pages will have this title.

attrs.label: title2
attrs.description: Secondary title text that is placed on the upper right on the title on many web pages.

attrs.label: welcomeText
attrs.description: Text that will be shown on the login screen.

attrs.label: minify
attrs.description: When enabled, the server will send reduced sized web pages.

attrs.label: localSessionRecording
attrs.description: When false, removes the local recording feature on remote desktop.

attrs.label: mstsc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based RDP client.

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based SSH client.

attrs.label: novnc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based VNC client.

attrs.label: geoLocation
attrs.description: Enables the geo-location feature and device location map in the user interface, this feature is not being worked on.

attrs.label: nightMode
attrs.description: 0 = User selects day/night mode, 1 = Always night mode, 2 = Always day mode

attrs.label: siteStyle
attrs.description: Valid numbers are 1 and 2, changes the style of the login page and some secondary pages.

attrs.label: rdp
attrs.description: Display a RDP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: Display a SSH link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: scp
attrs.description: Display a SCP link in the device tab when supported

14.3.0.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
14.3.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: aliasPort
attrs.description: The actual main port as seen externally on the Internet, this setting is often used when a reverse-proxy is used.

attrs.label: cert
attrs.description: Set this to the primary DNS name of this MeshCentral server.

attrs.label: tlsOffload
attrs.description: When true, indicates that a TLS offloader is in front of the MeshCentral server. More typically, set this to the IP address of the reverse proxy or TLS offloader so that IP forwarding headers will be trusted. For example 172.16.0.0/16

attrs.label: trustedProxy
attrs.description: Trust forwarded headers from these IPs or domains. Providing the magic string "CloudFlare" will cause the server to download the IP address list of trusted CloudFlare proxies directly from CloudFlare on each server start. For example 172.16.0.0/16. This should be left empty if traefik is used.

attrs.label: WANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral WAN features are enabled and agents will connect to the server using a well known DNS name.

attrs.label: LANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral LAN features are enabled and agents will find the server using multicast LAN packets.

attrs.label: webRTC
attrs.description: When enabled, allows use of WebRTC to allow direct network traffic between the agent and browser.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Enables GZIP compression for web requests.

attrs.label: wsCompression
attrs.description: Enables server-side, websocket per-message deflate compression.

attrs.label: agentWsCompression
attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.label: agentLogDump
attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.label: agentCoreDump
attrs.description: Automatically activates and transfers any agent crash dump files to the server in meshcentral-data/coredumps.

attrs.label: browserPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval and expects a response from the browser.

attrs.label: browserPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV
attrs.description: Enabled automated upload of the server backups to a WebDAV account.

attrs.label: username

attrs.label: password

attrs.label: folderName
attrs.description: The name of the folder to create in the WebDAV account.

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS
attrs.description: When set, relayPort value is ignored. Set this to a DNS name the points to this server. When the server is accessed using the DNS name, the main web server port is used as a web relay port.

attrs.label: Setup Messaging
attrs.description: This section allow MeshCentral to send messages over user messaging networks like Discord

subquestions.label: telegram

subquestions.label: discord

subquestions.label: xmpp
subquestions.description: Configure XMPP messaging system

attrs.label: certUrl
attrs.description: HTTPS URL when to get the TLS certificate that MeshAgent's will see when connecting to this server. This setting is used when a reverse proxy like Traefik is used in front of MeshCentral.

attrs.label: title
attrs.description: The title of this web site. All web pages will have this title.

attrs.label: title2
attrs.description: Secondary title text that is placed on the upper right on the title on many web pages.

attrs.label: welcomeText
attrs.description: Text that will be shown on the login screen.

attrs.label: minify
attrs.description: When enabled, the server will send reduced sized web pages.

attrs.label: localSessionRecording
attrs.description: When false, removes the local recording feature on remote desktop.

attrs.label: mstsc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based RDP client.

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based SSH client.

attrs.label: novnc
attrs.description: When enabled, activates the built-in web-based VNC client.

attrs.label: geoLocation
attrs.description: Enables the geo-location feature and device location map in the user interface, this feature is not being worked on.

attrs.label: nightMode
attrs.description: 0 = User selects day/night mode, 1 = Always night mode, 2 = Always day mode

attrs.label: siteStyle
attrs.description: Valid numbers are 1 and 2, changes the style of the login page and some secondary pages.

attrs.label: rdp
attrs.description: Display a RDP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: ssh
attrs.description: Display a SSH link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: scp
attrs.description: Display a SCP link in the device tab when supported

attrs.label: Setup Agent Customization

attrs.description: The name of the agent as displayed to the user.

attrs.description: This will be used as the path to install the agent, by default this is 'Mesh Agent' in Windows and 'meshagent' in other OS's.

attrs.label: serviceName

attrs.label: installText

14.2.1.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
14.2.1.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

chart_metadata.description: MeshCentral is a full computer management web site
chart_metadata.name: meshcentral

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Replicas (Advanced)
attrs.description: Set the number of Replicas

attrs.label: Extra Environment Variables
attrs.description: Please be aware that some variables are set in the background, adding duplicates here might cause issues or prevent the app from starting...

attrs.label: Show Advanced Settings
attrs.description: Advanced settings are not covered by TrueCharts Support

attrs.label: aliasPort
attrs.description: The actual main port as seen externally on the Internet, this setting is often used when a reverse-proxy is used.

attrs.label: cert
attrs.description: Set this to the primary DNS name of this MeshCentral server.

attrs.label: tlsOffload
attrs.description: When true, indicates that a TLS offloader is in front of the MeshCentral server. More typically, set this to the IP address of the reverse proxy or TLS offloader so that IP forwarding headers will be trusted. For example 172.16.0.0/16

attrs.label: trustedProxy
attrs.description: Trust forwarded headers from these IPs or domains. Providing the magic string "CloudFlare" will cause the server to download the IP address list of trusted CloudFlare proxies directly from CloudFlare on each server start. For example 172.16.0.0/16. This should be left empty if traefik is used.

attrs.label: WANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral WAN features are enabled and agents will connect to the server using a well known DNS name.

attrs.label: LANonly
attrs.description: When enabled, only MeshCentral LAN features are enabled and agents will find the server using multicast LAN packets.

attrs.label: webRTC
attrs.description: When enabled, allows use of WebRTC to allow direct network traffic between the agent and browser.

attrs.label: compression
attrs.description: Enables GZIP compression for web requests.

attrs.label: wsCompression
attrs.description: Enables server-side, websocket per-message deflate compression.

attrs.label: agentWsCompression
attrs.description: Enables agent-side, websocket per-message deflate compression. wscompression must also be true for this to work.

attrs.label: allowFraming
attrs.description: When enabled, the MeshCentral web site can be embedded within another website's iframe.

attrs.label: newAccounts
attrs.description: When set to true, allow new user accounts to be created from the login page.

attrs.label: allowHighQualityDesktop
attrs.description: When false, users will only be able to set remote desktop image quality to 60%, this can reduce server bandwidth usage.

attrs.label: agentLogDump
attrs.description: Automatically downloads all agent error logs into meshcentral-data/agenterrorlogs.txt.

attrs.label: agentCoreDump
attrs.description: Automatically activates and transfers any agent crash dump files to the server in meshcentral-data/coredumps.

attrs.label: browserPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval and expects a response from the browser.

attrs.label: browserPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the browser at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentPing
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval and expects a response from the agent.

attrs.label: agentPong
attrs.description: When specified, sends data to the agent at x seconds interval.

attrs.label: agentIdleTimeout
attrs.description: How much time in seconds with no traffic from an agent before dropping the agent connection.

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid login attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid login attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that login attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid login limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: time
attrs.description: Time in minutes over which the a maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts is allowed from an IP address.

attrs.label: count
attrs.description: Maximum number of invalid 2FA attempts from an IP address in the time period.

attrs.label: coolofftime
attrs.description: Additional time in minute that 2FA attempts will be denied once the invalid login limit is reached.

attrs.label: exclude
attrs.description: Ranges of IP addresses that are not subject to invalid 2FA limitations. For example 192.168.1.0/24,172.16.0.1

attrs.label: zipPassword
attrs.description: Leave empty for no password

attrs.label: Backup to Web DAV
attrs.description: Enabled automated upload of the server backups to a WebDAV account.

attrs.label: url
attrs.description: WebDAV account URL.

attrs.label: username
attrs.description: WebDAV account username.

attrs.label: password
attrs.description: WebDAV account password.

attrs.label: folderName
attrs.description: The name of the folder to create in the WebDAV account.

attrs.label: maxFiles
attrs.description: The maximum number of files to keep in the WebDAV folder, older files will be removed if needed.

attrs.label: relayDNS

14.2.0.app_readme:
MeshCentral is a full computer management web site

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/meshcentral

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
14.2.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
